description: An hpicfArpProtectErrantReply notification signifies that
the ARP protection entity is enabled and has detected
an errant ARP reply packet. The source and
destination addresses from the packet header are included
in the notification.

event.Summary: ARP protection entity is enabled and Errant ARP reply packet detected

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HP-ICF-ARP-PROTECT::hpicfArpProtectErrantReply HP-ICF-ARP-PROTECT::hpicfArpProtectErrantCnt c 9999 HP-ICF-ARP-PROTECT::hpicfArpProtectErrantSrcMac s EXAMPL HP-ICF-ARP-PROTECT::hpicfArpProtectErrantSrcIpType i 0 HP-ICF-ARP-PROTECT::hpicfArpProtectErrantSrcIp s EXAMPLE HP-ICF-ARP-PROTECT::hpicfArpProtectErrantDestMac s EXAMPL HP-ICF-ARP-PROTECT::hpicfArpProtectErrantDestIpType i 0 HP-ICF-ARP-PROTECT::hpicfArpProtectErrantDestIp s EXAMPLE

description: A count of hpicfArpProtectErrantReply sent
from the ARP Protection entity to the SNMP
entity. This count may differ from the count
of notifications transmitted due to rate
limiting or configuration.
variables.name: HP-ICF-ARP-PROTECT::hpicfArpProtectErrantCnt

description: Errant source MAC address included in a
hpicfArpProtectNotification.
variables.name: HP-ICF-ARP-PROTECT::hpicfArpProtectErrantSrcMac

description: IP Address type reported in hpicfArpProtectErrantSrcIp.
variables.name: HP-ICF-ARP-PROTECT::hpicfArpProtectErrantSrcIpType

description: Errant source IP address included in a
hpicfArpProtectNotification.
variables.name: HP-ICF-ARP-PROTECT::hpicfArpProtectErrantSrcIp

description: Errant destination MAC address included in a
hpicfArpProtectNotification.
variables.name: HP-ICF-ARP-PROTECT::hpicfArpProtectErrantDestMac

description: IP Address type reported in hpicfArpProtectErrantDestIp.
variables.name: HP-ICF-ARP-PROTECT::hpicfArpProtectErrantDestIpType

description: Errant destination IP address included in a
hpicfArpProtectNotification.
variables.name: HP-ICF-ARP-PROTECT::hpicfArpProtectErrantDestIp
